text: Schoolhouse Rock! was an American animated television show that aired from January 6, 1973 to March 31, 2009. The show is an educational-musical show that first aired on ABC. The topics the show taught children were grammar, science, economics, history, mathematics, and civics. Many of the songs were performed by Grady Tate. == Other websites == * Category:Animated television series Category:1970s television series Category:1980s Nickelodeon shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Schoolhouse Rock!
